articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Firing Competition among Teachers of Military Universities
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Firing Competition among Teachers of Military Universities
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, guided a firing competition among teachers of Kim Jong Suk Naval University and Kim Chaek Air Force University.
					 Its participants competed in shooting pistols and automatic rifles to hit the targets at the fixed distance and time. Winners were decided by points.
					
					 They pulled their triggers in the spirit of firing at the chests of the U.S. imperialist aggressors, the chieftain of aggression and the sworn enemy of the Korean people.
					
					 Whenever the bullets hit the targets right in the center, the spectators clapped their hands.
					
					 Saying that the objective of arranging such a firing competition often is to train all servicepersons as crack shots by intensifying the firing exercise, Kim Jong Un noted that its vitality was being fully displayed in the competition.
					
					 He said that the results of the current competition were higher than those in the recent firing contest among teachers of other military universities, adding that this clearly proved that the KPA was raising a strong wind of shooting drill as intended by the party.
					
					 The air force university won both the pistol firing and the automatic rifle firing to come first in team standing.
					
					 And then the competition was reviewed and the winners were awarded prizes.
					
					 Kim Jong Un appreciated the successful competition.
					
					 Among the spectators were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Kil, Kim Myong Sik, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol, Jo Kyong Chol, Pak Thae Su, Jang Tong Un, Han Kwang Sang, Hwang Pyong So and service personnel of the KPA.

articles.title: Special Envoy of Chinese Government Visits Riding Club
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Chinese Government Visits Riding Club
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Wu Dawei, special envoy of the Chinese government for the affairs of the Korean peninsula, and his party visited the Mirim Riding Club here Wednesday. 
					 They went round different places of the club contributing to the cultural and emotional life of working people and school youth and children of the country after being built as a general and modern service center for the people. 
					
					 At the end of the visit the special envoy made an entry in the visitor's book. 
					
					 They also visited the Meari Shooting Gallery on the same day.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Gives Reception 
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Wednesday to mark the 65th anniversary of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 Present there on invitation were Kang Sok Ju, vice-premier of the Cabinet; Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade; Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs; Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association; and officials concerned. 
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy were on hand. 
					
					 Alexandr Timonin in his speech said that the conclusion of the agreement 65 years ago marked a significant historic event in which both sides had started multi-faceted cooperation.
					
					 The principle of mutually beneficial cooperation, the basis of the agreement, was reflected in the agreement between the top leaders of the two countries in the new century and has been firmly adhered to since then, he noted.
					
					 He expressed hope that the friends of the DPRK would achieve successes in the work for bolstering up the national power.
					
					 Kang Sok Ju referred to the fact that the two countries had developed the bilateral relations through the economic cooperation and diverse cultural exchange for 65 years since the agreement was concluded.
					
					 He said that the DPRK-Russia relations have recently developed on good terms in the political, economic, cultural and other various fields under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 He noted that the DPRK will continue advancing hand in hand with the friends of Russia to boost the traditional DPRK-Russia friendly relations.

articles.title: Remodeling of Sports Village in Chongchun Street Completed
articles.content:
Remodeling of Sports Village in Chongchun Street Completed
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) ? The sports village in Chongchun Street has been successfully remodeled as a comprehensive sports center.
					 All gymnasiums, football stadium and restaurant for players have been completely face-lifted to satisfactorily ensure games, trainings and services at the best level.
					
					 Officials and employees of the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports erected with due respect a mosaic "The great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il present at the ceremony for the completion of Chongchun Street" and successfully built the monument to their revolutionary activities.
					
					 A ceremony for the completion of the remodeling of the sports village thanks to the personal initiative and energetic guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un was held on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Kwak Pom Gi, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, Ri Yong Su, department director of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, officials and builders who took part in the project, officials and players in the field of sports and other people in the city.
					
					 Kwak Pom Gi said that Kim Jong Un unrolled a far-reaching plan to remodel the sports village which are associated with immortal leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and  contributed to the development of the country's sports as required by the new century and has energetically led the work.
					
					 Officials and employees of the ministry should eternally glorify the immortal leadership feats of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, take good care of sports facilities and equipment and manage them well so that the party's loving care may reach the players and people, he noted.
					
					 He called upon the players and officials in the field of sports to intensify training in every way, carry on the dynamic drive to bring the sports science and technology to a world level as early as possible and demonstrate the dignity and honor of the prosperous DPRK with more gold medals.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants looked round the remodeled Sosan Football Stadium, the Table-Tennis Gymnasium and various other gymnasiums, and a restaurant for players.

articles.title: 29th Sci-Tech Festival of Kim Il Sung University Held
articles.content:
29th Sci-Tech Festival of Kim Il Sung University Held
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The 29th Science and Technology Festival of Kim Il Sung University took place here on March 11-14.
					 On display at the festival, divided into discussion and exhibition of sci-tech achievements and exchange of new technologies, were at least 290 research findings and papers on latest science and technology and scores of new technologies and intellectual products in forms of model, diagram and CD, all of them which are conducive to the development of the basic science and the building of an economic power.
					
					 What was eye-catching are achievements presented by the IT Institute, the Nano Technology Institute and the Material Science Faculty of the university. Among them are a titanic ceramic tool, computer programs for ensuring video meeting in real time and putting the production and economic management on an IT basis, and functional nano powder materials.
					
					 The titanic ceramic tool is able to process high-intensity structural steel, and it is 2-3 times higher in cutting efficiency and twice longer in serviceable time than the hard alloy tool. Functional nano powder materials are of economic significance in the fields of medicine, food and consumer goods industries and agriculture for their use in the state of solid or liquid.
					
					 Pyongyang Medical College and Pyongyang Agricultural College under the university, too, presented tens of research findings, including biological medicines, a method of processing rice seed-covering material and an apparatus for measuring hydrogen exponent and water content of soil.

articles.title: 16th Kimilsungia Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
16th Kimilsungia Festival to Be Held
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The 16th Kimilsungia Festival will be held with splendor here on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The festival, which will open at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition in mid-April, Juche 103 (2014), will bring together armed forces organs, ministries, national institutions, people of various circles, school youth and children, overseas Koreans including those of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and foreigners.
					
					 There will take place also in local areas Kimilsungia exhibitions and visits to Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses during the period.

articles.title: Medical Association of Korea
articles.content:
Medical Association of Korea
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The 16th Symposium on Medical Science, to be attended by Korean medical scientists at home and abroad, will be held here in May under the sponsorship of the Medical Association of Korea (MAK).
					 Founded on June 19, Juche 59 (1970), the MAK is the only standing social organization in medical science field, whose mission is to improve the health workers' level of medical science and technology and develop the nation's medical science through sci-tech exchanges.
					
					 It has more than 70 sectional associations and hundreds of branches, involving tens of thousands of health workers and medical experts with academic degree holders included.
					
					 The Association organizes various symposiums, workshops and lectures on medical science to introduce and generalize excellent scientific papers, experience and achievements and solve sci-tech problems arising in practice.
					
					 It also conducts sci-tech exchanges and cooperation with overseas Korean and foreign medical scientists and international and national medical organizations across the world. It sponsored a number of international symposiums on medical science in Pyongyang and strengthened the exchanges with medical experts in 30-odd countries, applying latest research findings in the public health field of the DPRK.
					
					 With an aim of developing the nation's medical science and technology, the MAK has regularly organized the Pyongyang symposium on medical science of compatriots at home and abroad since 1999.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bringing about New Turn in Developing Light Industry
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bringing About New Turn in Developing Light Industry
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) ? Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial calls for bringing about a new turn in developing light industry.
					 Uninterrupted innovations were made at workplaces in the light industrial sector over the past one year thanks to the efforts of officials and working people in the field of the light industry, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The number of factories and enterprises which overfulfilled the production plans of consumer goods in the same conditions as in ordinary time remarkably increased through the dynamic efforts to keep the production going at high rate.
					
					 Dynamic efforts were channeled to increasing the proportion of locally available raw and other materials, successfully putting production processes on a modern and scientific basis and building production processes for developing new goods so as to open a bright prospect for the production of consumer goods.
					
					 The successes clearly prove the validity and vitality of the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The party calls for raising a strong wind of effecting a great surge in the light industrial sector.
					
					 Only when leap forward is made in this sector as intended by the party, can the advantages and might of our socialist system be strikingly demonstrated and our harmonious whole be further consolidated.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK has laid a stumbling block in the way for Korea's reunification and unity of all Koreans, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The Korean nation is a homogeneous nation, rare to be found in the world, which has lived in one territory for five thousand years.
					
					 There is no reason for it to be divided into two parts in the light of its lineage, history and culture.
					
					 The division of the Korean nation is entirely attributable to the U.S. heinous and wild ambition to dominate Korea.
					
					 Even in the 21st century when independence has become a worldwide trend after the end of the Cold War, the U.S. has not abandoned its ulterior design to check the reunification of Korea while justifying its illegal occupation of south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. reckless acts against the DPRK have seriously harassed peace on the Korean peninsula and caused extreme tensions that may lead to a war any moment.
					
					 The U.S. has desperately pursued its hostile policy toward the DPRK, blocking the reunification of Korea and the reconciliation and unity of Koreans in all aspects. That is why the inter-Korean relations have faced trials, not making a fundamental progress.
					
					 In order to achieve durable peace on the Korean peninsula and accomplish the historic cause of Korea's reunification, it is necessary to thoroughly smash the U.S. vicious hostile policy toward the DPRK, to begin with.

articles.title: Sinister Aim of U.S. Defense Department's Report Revealed
articles.content:
Sinister Aim of U.S. Defense Department's Report Revealed
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Defense Department recently published a report on "quadrennial defense review".
					 In the report the U.S. stressed the need to bolster the armed forces for "defense of its mainland" and for "peace" and "stability" in Northeast Asia while vociferating about "provocation" and "increased threats" from someone.
					
					 This made it clearer that the U.S. will intensify its military activities for its long-term presence and military supremacy in the Asia-Pacific, says Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary.
					
					 The U.S. has become intent on beefing up military force and boosting military activities in the Asia-Pacific because it is of the view that its future hinges on its establishment of an unchallenged domination over the region, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Asia-Pacific region is faster in economic development than other regions and rich in natural resources and has huge markets. It is, at the same time, a strategic stronghold as it has major international sea routes.
					
					 But there are in this region big powers, strategic competitors and potential rivals which can challenge the national interests of the U.S.
					
					 Therefore, the U.S. considers bolstering military hegemony as essential for carrying out its pivot-to-Asia-Pacific strategy and seeks to deter or contain all the challenging forces that can stand in the way of realizing its strategy for world domination.
					
					 The U.S. needs a plausible pretext and justification to shift the pivot of its strategy for world domination to the Asia-Pacific region and this requires constant tension in the region.
					
					 This is the reason why the U.S. is working desperately to term the DPRK "provocateur" and "arch criminal posing threat".
					
					 The U.S., however, can never succeed in attaining its sinister aim to put the Asia-Pacific region under its control and reign over the world.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK at Once
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK at Once 
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement titled "U.S. should roll back its hostile policy toward DPRK at once" on Mar. 15.
					 The statement said that the association and all Koreans in China fully support the statement of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK which demanded the U.S. roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK in all fields, have a proper viewpoint and stand on the DPRK's nuclear deterrence and stop at once its groundless "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. "sanctions" aimed to eliminate the DPRK's self-defensive nuclear deterrence and its moves for "isolating and blockading" the latter and military threats to it are bringing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of war and the former's anti-DPRK "human rights" racket is reaching an extreme phase, going beyond the danger level.
					
					 The U.S., in particular, malignantly slandered the recent election of deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, making no scruple of perpetrating such provocation as unbearably insulting the people of the DPRK who took part in the election and voted for the candidates with loyalty and patriotism.
					
					 The nuclear deterrence of the DPRK will markedly be bolstered as long as the U.S. persists in its nuclear threats. The hatred of the army and people of the DPRK for the U.S. will mount high like unquenchable flames as long as the U.S. ratchets up its brigandish "sanctions" and "human rights" racket.
					
					 The U.S. should put off short-sighted sun glasses it used to wear with its deep-rooted hostile outlook on the DPRK and see the world with clear eyes. If it wants to avoid an abyss of ruin, it should roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK at once.
					
					 All Koreans in China and overseas Koreans will wage a more dynamic struggle to resolutely shatter the U.S. vicious hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Koreans in China Warn U.S. of Merciless Punishment for Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Koreans in China Warn U.S. of Merciless Punishment for Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The Youth Federation of Korean Nationals in China issued a statement titled "U.S. will be mercilessly punished for its persistent hostile policy toward DPRK" on Mar. 15.
					 The statement recalled that the National Defence Commission of the DPRK in a statement on Mar. 14 solemnly clarified at home and abroad the principled stand of the DPRK on the U.S. hostile policy toward it.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The U.S. let loose a spate of sheer sophism, terming the DPRK's regular rocket launching drills a "provocation" and "violation of resolutions." It ran the whole gamut of invectives against the DPRK and made no scruple of making such provocation as groundlessly slandering even the election of deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which has dared to encroach upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, while taking issue with whatever it has done for decades. It is again the U.S., the sworn enemy of the Korean people, which has behaved so meanly to undermine the ideology and bring down the social system of the DPRK.
					
					 We express irrepressible hatred and resentment at the U.S. bringing the situation to a grave phase and fully support and approve the principled stand of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in its arrogant and anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK, defying the grave situation, it will not be able to escape the merciless punishment by the angry people of the DPRK in the long run.

articles.title: Confidence and Confrontation Can Never Go Together: Overseas Koreans Organization
articles.content:
Confidence and Confrontation Can Never Go Together: Overseas Koreans Organization
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- An article demanding the south Korean authorities sincerely come out for mending the north-south relations was posted by the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany on its website on March 15. 
					 The south Korean authorities' betrayal attitude toward the issue of the north-south relations is disappointing Koreans, the article said, and went on:
					
					 When an opportunity presents itself, the south Korean authorities talk about "confidence" but persist in mud-slinging escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen, 
					
					 Now the south Korean authorities are talking about a "report" cooked up by a plot-breeding organization under the UN Human Rights Council, claiming that to accuse the north of its human rights issue is not a mud-slinging.
					
					 The "report" with "reliable data" touted by them was cooked up to please the U.S. to realize the international cooperation for stifling the DPRK from A to Z as it is based on "evidence" of human scum who defected to the south, abandoning their parents, wives and children after committing crimes and swindles. 
					
					 The south Korean conservative media, obsessed with confrontation frenzy, are getting hell-bent on invectives against the DPRK, continuing to spread false stories of human scum. 
					
					 Riff-raffs of an organization of "defectors from the north" without elementary disposition of human being are appearing before media to improve their dirty images, letting loose invectives against the DPRK while distorting its reality they do not know properly and slandering even the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK just like a puppy knowing no fear of the tiger.
					
					 Intolerable is the confrontation racket of the conservative media malignantly slandering the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system while spreading such provocative outbursts which deserve the punishment of Heaven. Worse still, the south Korean authorities are conniving and patronizing this, talking about "freedom of speech". This is nothing but an all-out challenge to the aspiration and demand of the nation. 
					
					 Confidence and confrontation can never go together. 
					
					 The inter-Korean relations will not be mended and tensions be escalated as long as the south Korean authorities are talking about "confidence" but, in actuality, resorting to confrontation with fellow countrymen while misleading public opinion with deceptive wordplay.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should behave themselves at a responsible time whether the north-south relations will improve in line with the aspiration and demand of the nation or not.

articles.title: U.S., Arch Criminal Wrecking Peace and Security: Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
U.S., Arch Criminal Wrecking Peace and Security: Overseas Koreans 
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany released a joint statement on Mar. 11 denouncing the U.S. for wrecking peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					 The U.S. is resorting to the moves to mislead public opinion and put pressure on the DPRK, terming its rocket launching drills a "provocation" and "violation of resolutions", the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. is allowed to stage war maneuvers by mobilizing huge forces enough to wage a war in other's territorial waters while the DPRK is not allowed to conduct regular military drills in its own territorial waters to defend its sovereignty. This is nothing but shameless sophism.
					
					 The U.S. has deliberately strained the situation whenever the DPRK tries to improve the relations between the north and the south. This proves in practice that it is none other than the U.S. which is wrecking peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is massively introducing lethal weapons into south Korea, ceaselessly staging frantic war exercises to deliberately bring the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of war. This proves, in the final analysis, that the U.S. is a violator of the UN resolutions.
					
					 The world people of conscience should turn out in the just struggle to condemn the wrecker of peace and security on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Germany
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Germany
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Berlin on Mar. 11.
					 Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to widely introduce the sacred revolutionary career and undying feats of the President and organize diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Int'l Preparatory Committee Formed to Celebrate Day of Sun
articles.content:
Int'l Preparatory Committee Formed to Celebrate Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- An international preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed on Mar. 13.
					 Mikhail Panchenko, general secretary of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions, and Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected executive secretaries of the preparatory committee.
					
					 A decision of the international alliance on the inauguration of the preparatory committee was read out.
					
					 It underscored the need for the preparatory committee to organize diverse political and cultural events.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Hungary
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Hungary
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- A Hungarian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Budapest on Mar. 13.
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It set the celebration period from Mar. 13 to April 16 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the undying feats and noble revolutionary career of the President during the period.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Stop Mud-slinging at DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Stop Mud-slinging at DPRK 
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association released a joint statement on March 6 in support of the statement of the spokesman for the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 It is very clear that the DPRK's rocket launching drills are the inviolable independent right.
					
					 The U.S. has no reason to make much ado, taking issue with the DPRK over its rocket launching drills.
					
					 Arrogance and hypocrisy of the U.S. have reached an extreme phase.
					
					 The U.S. is staging the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military maneuvers to stifle the DPRK by force.
					
					 Though the U.S. introduced a nuclear submarine into south Korea and let nuclear strategic bombers fly in the sky over the Korean peninsula, it accuses the DPRK of escalating tensions. Does the U.S. have face to slander the DPRK?
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which escalates tensions on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. should not resort to foolish acts to apply new gangster-like sanctions against the DPRK under the pretext of its rocket launching drills.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to stop the unreasonable and anachronistic mud-slinging at the DPRK.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Benin
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Benin
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- A Beninese national preparatory committee for celebrating the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Cotonou on Mar. 11.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea who is chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader", was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the undying feats of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Beninese
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Beninese
						
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Personages of Benin praised President Kim Il Sung's exploits.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea who is also chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader", made a speech at the inaugural ceremony of the Beninese national preparatory committee for celebrating the 102nd birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung on March 11.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The President built the socialist system centred on the popular masses on the land of Korea in which the people have become the master of everything and everything serves them.
					
					 He made sure that people were fully provided with all socio-political conditions so that they could exercise their rights as the master of the country, and their requirement and will were applied to politics.
					
					 His original idea of state-building and the exploits he performed in building the genuine people's country through his veteran and tested leadership will be everlasting.
					
					 Rector of the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin Pascal Zouncheme, chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism, said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was deeply revered by the Korean people and the world progressives as not only eternal President of the DPRK but also great pioneer of the human cause of independence.
					
					 He provided the invincible guidelines for accomplishing the cause of independence by founding the Juche idea, the Songun idea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige competencia de tiro de profesores y empleados de academias militares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige competencia de tiro de profesores y empleados de academias militares
						
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio la competencia de tiro de los profesores y empleados de la Academia de Fuerzas Navales Kim Jong Suk y la Academia de Fuerzas Aereas Kim Chaek.
					Los tiradores compitieron por la victoria con las notas alcanzadas con la pistola y el fusil automatico en la distancia y el tiempo fijados.
					
					Ellos apretaron gatillos con el sentimiento de lanzar las balas a los pechos de los imperialistas yanquis, caudillo de agresion y  enemigo jurado del pueblo coreano.
					
					Cada vez que los tiradores acertaban los blancos, los espectadores les dieron aplausos.
					
					El Comandante Supremo subrayo que el objetivo de organizar a menudo la competencia de tiro es para fortalecer los ejercicios de tiro para que todos los militares se preparen como tiradores infalibles y agrego que en la presente competencia se muestra su vitalidad.
					
					Senalo que la nota de la competencia de los profesores y empleados de las academias de fuerzas navales Kim Jong Suk y de fuerzas aereas Kim Chak es elevada en comparacion con la de la competencia de academias militares efectuada hace poco, lo cual demuestra que el EPC levanta una ola de entrenamiento de tiro conforme a la voluntad del partido.
					
					En las competencias de pistola y fusil automatico gano la Academia de Fuerzas Aereas Kim Chaek, a que correspondio victoria general.
					
					Terminada la competencia, hubo el balance y la premiacion.
					
					El Comandante Supremo evaluo el desarrollo exitoso de la competencia.
					
					Le acompanaron en verla Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Kim Myong Sik, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol, Jo Kyong Chol, Pak Thae Su, Jang Tong Un, Han Kwang Sang, Hwang Pyong So, los oficiales y soldados del EPC.

articles.title: Clausurado festival cientifico y tecnico de la Universidad Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Clausurado festival cientifico y tecnico de la Universidad Kim Il Sung
						
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 11 al 14 el XXIX festival cientifico y tecnico de la Universidad Kim Il Sung en forma de la presentacion y exhibicion de exitos cientifico-tecnicos y del intercambio de nuevas tecnologias.
					En la ocasion estuvieron exhibidos mas de 290 logros de investigacion que contribuiran al desarrollo de ciencias basicas y la construccion de potencia economica, las disertaciones de ciencia y tecnologia de punta y decenas de nuevas tecnologias y productos intelectuales en forma de maqueta, esquema y CD, etc.
					
					Entre ellos se destacan los exitos presentados por el instituto de IT, el de nanotecnologia y la facultad de la ciencia de materiales.
					
					El Instituto Superior de Medicina de Pyongyang, adscrito a la Universidad Kim Il Sung, presento decenas de exitos de investigacion, inclusive los medicamentos biologicos desarrollados con la tecnologia de punta.
					
					El Instituto Superior de Agricultura de Pyongyang, adscrito a la misma universidad, exhibio en forma de maqueta y esquema nuevos logros, entre otros, el metodo de revestimiento de semilla de arroz, el indicador de PH de la tierra y la humedad, etc.

articles.title: Noticias de primera ronda de la liga de futbol de categoria A
articles.content:
Noticias de primera ronda de la liga de futbol de categoria A
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tiene lugar la primera ronda de la liga de futbol de categoria A del Torneo Deportivo por el Premio Mangyongdae centrando la atencion de los deportistas y aficionados. 
					En el torneo masculino sobresalen los equipos 25 de Abril, Rimyongsu y Mangyongbong.
					
					En los partidos de futbol masculino efectuados el dia 18 el equipo Ryongaksan y el Amnokgang vencieron al Kwanmobong y al Myohyangsan por 3:0 y 1:0, respectivamente.
					
					Las selecciones Kigwancha y del Ministerio de la Industria Ligera quedaron empatados por 2:2.
					
					En los partidos femeninos el equipo Ryongaksan gano al Sinhungsan por 3:0 y los onces Mangyongbong y Rimyongsu vencieron a los Myohyangsan y Kalmaegi por 1:0, respectivamente.
					
					La liga continua.

articles.title: Asociacion de Medicos de Corea
articles.content:
Asociacion de Medicos de Corea
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tendra lugar en mayo en esta capital el XVI simposio de ciencias medicas de Pyongyang de los compatriotas en el interior y exterior del pais bajo el auspicio de la Asociacion de Medicos de Corea.
					Fundada el 19 de junio del 59 (1970) de la Era Juche, la asociacion es una organizacion social permanente y cientifica de la rama medica, cuya mision es mejorar el nivel cientifica y tecnica de los funcionarios de la salud publica e impulsar el desarrollo de ciencia medica a traves del intercambio de la ciencia y tecnica del interior y exterior del pais.
					
					Tiene como sucursal mas de 70 asociaciones por ramas y cientos de  asociaciones regionales a que se incorporan los poseedores de titulos academicos y grados docentes, decenas de miles de funcionarios de salud publica y especialistas medicos.
					
					La asociacion organiza seminarios inclusive el seminario nacional de ciencias medicas, el cursillo, la leccion ambulante, la tele-conferencia medica, el seminario de experiencias clinicas y la leccion cientifica y otros, aplica y normaliza las excelentes disertaciones cientificas, las experiencias y los exitos de investigacion y da solucion a los problemas cientificos que se presentan en la realidad.
					
					Desarrolla independientemente el intercambio cientifico y la cooperacion con los medicos coreanos residente en extranjero, las asociaciones medicas internacionales, las entidades medicas  y las organizaciones academicas y los medicos de otros paises.
					
					Organizo el Simposio Internacional de Ciencias Medicas de Pyongyang sobre la Acupuntura y otros e intensifica el intercambio con los especialistas afamados de mas de 30 paises para aplicar los ultimos exitos medicos en la practica.
					
					A fin de desarrollar la ciencia y la tecnica medicas de la nacion, organiza ordinariamente desde 1999 el simposio de ciencias medicas de Pyongyang de los compatriotas en el interior y exterior del pais.

articles.title: Tendra lugar XVI Festival de Kimilsungias
articles.content:
Tendra lugar XVI Festival de Kimilsungias
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento (15 de abril) del Presidente Kim Il Sung, tendra lugar desde mediados de abril en la capitalina Exposicion Permanente de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia el XVI Festival de Kimilsungias.
					En la ocasion participaran las instituciones de fuerzas armadas, ministerios, organos centrales, trabajadores de distintos estratos, jovenes y ninos escolares, entidades de los coreanos en ultramar, inclusive Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon), y amigos extranjeros.
					
					En las localidades del pais se abrira tambien la exposicion de esa flor inmortal y se realizara la visita al invernadero de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia.
